name: Spicy Peppercorn Clams
keywords: appetizer, main course, clams, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds littleneck or mahogany clams, scrubbed
3 long red chilis, cored, seeded and sliced thin
1/2 tablespoon cornstarch dissolved in 1/3 cup dry white wine

recipeInstructions.text: Place clams in heavy 3-quart saucepan. Add 1/2 cup water, cover and steam over medium heat until clams open. Remove clams to covered dish, strain liquid and reserve 1/2 cup.

Heat oil in 4-quart shallow saucepan. Add shallots, garlic and ginger, and saute until lightly browned. Stir in chilis and peppercorns, cook for about a minute, then stir in wine mixture and 1/2 cup liquid from clams. Simmer until thickened. Add lime juice. Remove from heat.
Remove top shells of clams, and discard them. Add half-shell clams to saucepan, and simmer about 3 minutes. Sprinkle with cilantro, and serve as appetizer or, with steamed jasmine rice, as main dish.
